description: Madoka Kei is a girl who transferred into Southern Cross Academy`s highschool division, 1st year class 2, along with Kou Atari. She`s a member of the Glittering Crux, Window Star. At first glance, she seems like a quiet, refined young lady, but she`s actually got such an extreme personality that Kanako Watanabe even described her as "really dangerous."
name: Kei Madoka
